title: 2D porous hexaniobate-bismuth vanadate hybrid photocatalyst for photodegradation of aquatic refractory pollutants
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Shirin P. Kulkarni, Vikas V. Magdum, Yogesh M. Chitare, Dhanaji B. Malavekar, Jin H. Kim, Sultan Alshehri, Jayavant L. Gunjakar, Shashikant P. Patole
